history.proof: intros n. induction n. - intros x Hx. hauto l: on depth: 3. - intros x Hx. hauto l: on depth: 3.

In environment A : Type CA : Countable A init : Ensemble A P : Ensemble A -> Prop n : nat IHn : Included A (LindenbaumChain n) LindenbaumConstruction x : A Hx : Ensembles.In A (fun a : A => LindenbaumChain n a \\/ CA a n /\\ P (Union A (LindenbaumChain n) (Singleton A a))) x Unable to unify "forall x : A, Ensembles.In A (LindenbaumChain ?M2242) x -> Ensembles.In A (LindenbaumChain (S n)) x" with "exists n : nat, LindenbaumChain n x".

In environment A : Type CA : Countable A init : Ensemble A P : Ensemble A -> Prop H0 : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> Included A (LindenbaumChain n) (LindenbaumChain m) n : nat IHn : Included A (LindenbaumChain n) LindenbaumConstruction x : A Hx : Ensembles.In A (fun a : A => LindenbaumChain n a \\/ CA a n /\\ P (Union A (LindenbaumChain n) (Singleton A a))) x H1 : nat Unable to unify "S ?M2468 <= S ?M2469" with "exists n : nat, LindenbaumChain n x".

In environment A : Type CA : Countable A init : Ensemble A P : Ensemble A -> Prop H4 : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> Included A (LindenbaumChain n) (LindenbaumChain m) H2 : forall n : nat, n <= n H : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> S n <= S m n : nat IHn : Included A (LindenbaumChain n) LindenbaumConstruction x : A Hx : Ensembles.In A (fun a : A => LindenbaumChain n a \\/ CA a n /\\ P (Union A (LindenbaumChain n) (Singleton A a))) x H1, H5 : nat Unable to unify "Ensembles.In A (fun a : A => LindenbaumChain n a \\/ CA a n /\\ P (Union A (LindenbaumChain n) (Singleton A a))) x" with "Ensembles.In A LindenbaumConstruction x".

original: intros n. induction n. - intros x Hx. apply Hx. - intros x Hx. right. split. + apply Lindenbaum_included_n_m with (m := S n). apply Le.le_n_S, Le.le_refl. + apply Hx.
